changes.reasoning: Install and configure shadcn/ui component library with Tailwind CSS v4 integration. This provides a consistent, polished design system with pre-built accessible components like Button, Card, Input, Badge, Tabs, etc.

Create a comprehensive design system in globals.css with oklch color variables for primary (purple accent), semantic colors for status states, and custom diff viewer styling that overrides diff2html defaults with better visual hierarchy.

Redesign main page with proper header featuring logo/branding, breadcrumb navigation for repo/PR/commit context, and clean card-based layout. Uses shadcn Tabs component for switching between Files Changed and Commits views.

Improve RepoSelector with skeleton loading states, search functionality with icon, language color dots for visual identification, relative date formatting (today, yesterday, X days ago), and proper error handling with manual entry fallback.

Improve PRSelector with search filtering, status icons (CircleDot for open, GitMerge for closed), colored status badges, and branch merge direction indicators. Added skeleton loading states for better perceived performance.
Improve CommitList with timeline-style visualization using commit icons and connecting lines, better metadata display with author/date badges, and hover reveal animations for chevron indicators.
Simplify DiffViewer by removing deprecated diff2html options and letting CSS handle the visual improvements. The component now focuses on rendering while globals.css handles styling.

Redesign PRDiffViewer with tabbed interface (By Reasoning vs By File), collapsible file sections with expand/collapse toggles, and consistent card styling. Reasoning sections now have colored left borders and lightbulb icons for visual hierarchy.

Improve TrackingVisualizer with proper commit header showing author/hash, amber warning cards when tracking file is missing, and organized reasoning sections with file counts. Uses consistent card styling throughout.
